oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We study collective excitations in rotating chiral media in presence of magnetic fi?eld both in hydrodynamic framework and in kinetic theory. We ?find that the velocity of the mixed Chiral Magnetic-Vortical Wave is a vector sum of velocities of pure Magnetic and Vortical waves which do not exist separately under these conditions. We also use relaxation time approximation to prove that this wave itself is a non-dissipative phenomenon.
